General.Name: Kerry Express (Thailand) Public Company Limited
General.Description: Kerry Express (Thailand) Public Company Limited provides parcel delivery services in Thailand. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Kerry Express (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of KLN Logistics (Thailand) Limited.
General.Address: No. 89, Chao Phaya Tower, Bangkok, Thailand, 10500

6.Name: Mr. Ekaphon  Kupnantarak
6.Title: Head of Internal Audit & Mang. of Internal Audit
